mapper.select: SELECT M.USERNAME, M.USERID, M.EMAIL, M.PHONE, M.ROLENUM, R.ROLENAME, M.BLOCK FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN ROLE R ON M.ROLENUM = R.ROLENUM WHERE M.USERID =#{userId} and M.PASSWORD =#{password} ORDER BY R.ROLENUM ASC
SELECT M.USERNAME, M.USERID, M.ROLENUM FROM MEMBER WHERE USERID=#{userId}
SELECT COUNT(USERID) FROM MEMBER WHERE USERID=#{userId}
SELECT COUNT(USERID) FROM MEMFILE WHERE USERID=#{userId}

SELECT M.USERID, M.PASSWORD, M.ROLENUM, R.ROLENAME, M.USERNAME, M.EMAIL, M.PHONE, M.ADDRESS, M.DEADDRESS, M.ITEMZIPCODE,M.BLOCK, M.AGMAIL, M.AGVALUE, M.AGMES, G.PETCATG, G.PETNAME, MF.FILENAME, MF.ORINAME FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN GUEST G ON M.USERID = G.USERID LEFT JOIN ROLE R ON M.ROLENUM =R.ROLENUM LEFT JOIN MEMFILE MF ON M.USERID = MF.USERID WHERE M.USERID=#{userId}

SELECT M.USERID, M.PASSWORD, M.ROLENUM, R.ROLENAME, M.USERNAME, M.EMAIL, M.PHONE, M.ADDRESS,M.DEADDRESS, M.ITEMZIPCODE, M.BLOCK, M.AGMAIL, M.AGVALUE, M.AGMES FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN ROLE R ON M.ROLENUM =R.ROLENUM WHERE M.USERID=#{userId}
SELECT M.USERID, M.ROLENUM, R.ROLENAME, M.USERNAME, M.EMAIL, M.BLOCK, MF.FILENAME FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN ROLE R ON M.ROLENUM =R.ROLENUM LEFT JOIN MEMFILE MF ON M.USERID = MF.USERID

SELECT MR. *, MF.FILENAME FROM (SELECT M.USERID, M.ROLENUM, R.ROLENAME, M.USERNAME, M.EMAIL, M.BLOCK FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN ROLE R ON M.ROLENUM =R.ROLENUM where M.rolenum=#{roleNum}) MR LEFT JOIN MEMFILE MF ON MR.USERID = MF.USERID where MR.USERID LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
SELECT F.FOLLOWEE, MF.FILENAME from FOLLOW F LEFT JOIN MEMFILE MF ON (F.FOLLOWEE = MF.USERID) WHERE FOLLOWER =#{userId}
SELECT F.FOLLOWER, MF.FILENAME from FOLLOW F LEFT JOIN MEMFILE MF ON (F.FOLLOWER = MF.USERID) WHERE FOLLOWEE =#{userId}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT FOLLOWER) FROM FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWEE=#{userId}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT FOLLOWEE) FROM FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWER=#{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWEE=#{userId} AND FOLLOWER=#{follower}
DELETE FROM FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWEE=#{followee} AND FOLLOWER=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT C.*, UC.* FROM COUPON C LEFT JOIN USERCOUPON UC ON C.COUPONNUM = UC.COUPONNUM WHERE UC.USERID = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET BLOCK=1 WHERE USERID=#{userId}
UPDATE MEMBER SET BLOCK=0 WHERE USERID=#{userId}

UPDATE member SET PASSWORD=#{password}, USERNAME=#{userName}, EMAIL=#{email}, PHONE=#{phone}, ADDRESS=#{address},DEADDRESS=#{deAddress}, ITEMZIPCODE=#{itemZipCode}, AGMES=#{agMes} where USERID=#{userId}
UPDATE Guest SET PETCATG=#{petCatg}, PETNAME=#{petName} where USERID=#{userId}
UPDATE MEMFILE SET FILENAME=#{fileName}, ORINAME=#{oriName} where USERID=#{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PICK WHERE ITEMNUM=#{itemNum} AND USERID=#{userId}
DELETE FROM SHOPCART WHERE ITEMNUM=#{itemNum} AND USERID=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT USERID,PASSWORD, EMAIL FROM MEMBER WHERE USERID=#{userId} AND EMAIL=#{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET PASSWORD=#{password} WHERE USERID=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT M.USERID,P.PICKNUM,SI.ITEMNUM,SI.ITEMNAME,SI.ITEMPRICE,SI.ITEMCONTENTS,SF.FILENAME FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN PICK P ON M.USERID = P.USERID INNER JOIN SELLITEM SI ON P.ITEMNUM = SI.ITEMNUM INNER JOIN SELLFILE SF ON SI.ITEMNUM = SF.ITEMNUM WHERE M.USERID =#{userId} ORDER BY P.PICKNUM DESC

SELECT M.USERID,S.SHOPNUM,S.TOTALPRICE,SI.ITEMNUM,SI.ITEMNAME,SI.USERID AS BIZID,SI.ITEMPRICE,SI.ITEMCONTENTS,SF.FILENAME,S.REVSTARTDAY,S.REVENDDAY,S.ADULTSNUM,S.DOGNUM FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN SHOPCART S ON M.USERID = S.USERID INNER JOIN SELLITEM SI ON S.ITEMNUM = SI.ITEMNUM INNER JOIN SELLFILE SF ON SI.ITEMNUM = SF.ITEMNUM WHERE M.USERID =#{userId} ORDER BY S.SHOPNUM DESC
SELECT SUM(S.TOTALPRICE) AS TOTALPRICE FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN SHOPCART S ON M.USERID = S.USERID WHERE M.USERID = #{userId}
